ai-kv4.2:1.1_0: is lovely and delight in it.
ai-kv4.2:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.2:2.1_0: is lovely and delight in it.
ai-kv4.2:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.2:3.1_0: is lovely and delight in it.
ai-kv4.2:3.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.2:4.3_0: and one who is reborn in a stream-enterer, not a stream-enterer.
ai-kv4.2:5.1_0: With a once-returner, he is not reborn in the underworld.
ai-kv4.2:5.3_0: and he is one who says “I have no once-returner”.
ai-kv4.2:6.3_0: And if he is one who has been reborn in a non-returner, he does not say,
ai-kv4.2:7.1_0: is lovely and delight in it.
ai-kv4.2:7.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv4.2:7.9_0: The Great Elder, who was endowed with good fortune,
ai-kv4.2:7.10_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.2:8.1_0: Sāriputta is unable to live in shade.
ai-kv4.2:8.3_0: Now he can speak up for his place, not the Elder Sāriputta.
ai-kv4.2:9.5_0: Thera Mahānāma, a great Sahadhamma, does not delight in it.
ai-kv4.2:9.7_0: and he said, “We’re no longer one,” and the senior venerable Mahākappina should not say this.
ai-kv4.2:10.1_0: is lovely and delight in it.
ai-kv4.2:10.3_0: One whose mind is capable of realizing anything that can be realized by insight.
ai-kv4.2:10.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.2:11.1_0: is lovely and delight in it.
ai-kv4.2:11.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.2:12.1_0: So that’s not what they do.
ai-kv4.2:12.4_0: If they’re not created by rebirths, nor have they set out for the ending of defilements, not discontent with the lower realms.
ai-kv4.2:12.4_1: And you should correct our corruption:
ai-kv4.2:13.1_0: is lovely and delight in it.
ai-kv4.2:13.3_0: ‘When they’ve got rid of greed, hate, and delusion give them up.’
ai-kv4.2:13.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.2:14.1_0: is lovely and delight in it.
ai-kv4.2:14.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.2:15.1_0: is lovely and delight in it.
ai-kv4.2:15.3_0: They realize the origin of suffering as a cessation.
ai-kv4.2:15.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.2:15.5_0: is lovely and delight in it.
ai-kv4.2:15.7_0: with a mind full of peace, a mind that is indecent, (wholesome) the mind,
ai-kv4.2:15.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.2:15.9_0: The story at Upavattana is finished.
